pages.title: Shoot and Loot
pages.text: Now that you've made it in, there's plenty of useful stuff stored in there, but what you're really looking for are $(item)Otherworlds' Cores$(). With these we should be able to open portals to further planes which hold a bounty of new resources. We'll need 3 in total at present. Be careful though, this place has been left unchecked for a long time.

pages.title: Moooom, I diiiiiied!
pages.text: If you find yourself as dead as my great-grandpa, you can recover your items by $(l:collected_knowledge/death#enchanted_key)Enchanting your Grave's Key$().
